mapping_detail_desc: Tights with an elasticated waist and a reinforced toe section.
Top in a patterned weave with a V-neck and spaghetti straps.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined hood, zip down the front, and side pockets. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, a low crotch and wide legs. Jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
